VCSLogAttributeAutomation.label: Commits into ticket
VCSLogAttributeAutomation.template:
<strong>[[event]]</strong> event form GitHub !
[[@image context->repository->owner->avatar_url 32]] [[@mailto committer->email as committer->username]]
<a href="[[url]]" target="_blank" style="font-size:1.5rem;">#[[@substring id 0 6]]</a> on ğŸŒµ [[context->ref]] [[message]]
[[@hyperlink context->compare as compare on GitHub]]

VCSLogJournalAutomation.label: All events tracking
VCSLogJournalAutomation.template: [[@image sender->avatar_url 25]] [[event]] fired by [[@hyperlink sender->html_url as sender->login]]
